title._content: Image taken from page 27 of '[The Butterfly's Ball, and the Grasshopper's Feast. By Mr. Roscoe. To which is added, an original poem, entitled A Winter's day. By Mr. Smith, of Stand. (A new and improved edition, with new plates.)]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[The Butterfly's Ball, and the Grasshopper's Feast. By Mr. Roscoe. To which is added, an original poem, entitled A Winter's day. By Mr. Smith, of Stand. (A new and improved edition, with new plates.)]" Author: Roscoe, William Contributor: Mulready, William Contributor: WELSH, Charles. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11645.ff.30.(1.)" Page: 27 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: Griffith & Farran Edition: [Another edition.] A facsimile reproduction of the edition of 1808. With an introduction by C. Welsh. (Illustrated by ... W. Mulready.). Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003157861 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
